name: Pit Brawl
description:
Throughout history there have been many types of conflict. Person vs. person, person vs. self, person vs. fate, and many more. But now,  the ultimate conflict can be resolved: person vs. pit!

Pit Brawl is a local multiplayer endless runner where one player is the person and the other controls the pits that person must avoid. It was made in Construct Free Edition as a game design exercise, and stylized after the sort of super amateur and unpolished but also super unique and inventive flash games you could only find on the 2000s-era Internet.

Pit Brawl is a two-player game only. (I mean, you could technically play it by yourself, but you'd be playing both roles and that's not nearly as fun, is it? So playing with a friend is highly recommended.)
